root.title: Suspicious Binary Writes Via AnyDesk
root.description: Detects AnyDesk writing binary files to disk other than "gcapi.dll". According to RedCanary research it is highly abnormal for AnyDesk to write executable files to disk besides gcapi.dll, which is a legitimate DLL that is part of the Google Chrome web browser used to interact with the Google Cloud API. (See reference section for more details)
root.author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
